meanings.definition: A genus of perennial herbs in the lily family, native to North America.
meanings.sent1: The clintonia grows beautiful flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a clintonia while hiking in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The clintonia decided to throw a party for all the other plants.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness bloomed like a clintonia in the midst of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the clintonia brightened up the entire meadow.

meanings.definition: Any plant belonging to the genus Clintonia.
meanings.sent1: Is that a clintonia near the riverbank?
meanings.sent2: The clintonia in the botanical garden looked stunning.
meanings.sent3: The clintonia was the star of the plant show.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like a clintonia in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the clintonia filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: The common name for plants in the genus Clintonia.
meanings.sent1: Have you ever seen a clintonia in the wild?
meanings.sent2: The clintonia is also known as the bluebead lily.
meanings.sent3: The clintonia whispered secrets to the other flowers.
meanings.sent4: His smile lit up the room like a clintonia in the shade.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the clintonia danced in the breeze.
